name: @briebug/cypress-schematic
description: Add cypress to an Angular CLI project

scripts.build:clean:launch: npm run build && npm run clean:launch
scripts.build:clean:launch:v12: npm run build && npm run clean:launch:v12
scripts.clean: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox && git clean -f -d sandbox
scripts.clean:v12: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox-v12 && git clean -f -d sandbox-v12
scripts.clean:launch: npm run clean && npm run launch
scripts.clean:launch:v12: npm run clean:v12 && npm run launch:v12
scripts.launch: npm run link:sandbox && cd sandbox && ng add @briebug/cypress-schematic --remove-protractor
scripts.launch:v12: npm run link:sandbox:v12 && cd sandbox-v12 && ng add @briebug/cypress-schematic --no-remove-protractor
scripts.link:sandbox: npm link && cd sandbox && npm link @briebug/cypress-schematic
scripts.link:sandbox:v12: npm link && cd sandbox-v12 && npm link @briebug/cypress-schematic
scripts.unlink:sandbox: cd sandbox && npm unlink @briebug/cypress-schematic && cd .. && npm unlink
scripts.test: npm run build:clean:launch && npm run test:sandbox && npm run clean
scripts.test:v12: npm run build:clean:launch:v12 && npm run test:sandbox:v12 && npm run clean:v12
scripts.test:sandbox: cd sandbox && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build && npm run e2e
scripts.test:sandbox:v12: cd sandbox-v12 && npm run test && npm run build && npm run e2e
scripts.build:clean:launch:ws: npm run build && npm run clean:launch:ws
scripts.clean:ws: git checkout HEAD -- sandbox-workspace && git clean -f -d sandbox-workspace
scripts.clean:launch:ws: npm run clean:ws && npm run launch:ws
scripts.launch:ws: npm run link:workspace && cd sandbox-workspace && ng add @briebug/cypress-schematic --remove-protractor
scripts.link:workspace: npm link && cd sandbox-workspace && npm link @briebug/cypress-schematic
scripts.unlink:workspace: cd sandbox-workspace && npm unlink @briebug/cypress-schematic && cd .. && npm unlink
scripts.test:ws: npm run build:clean:launch:ws && npm run test:sandbox-workspace && npm run clean:ws
scripts.test:sandbox-workspace: cd sandbox-workspace && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build

author: Briebug
